mapper.select: select b_idx, writer, title, hit, reg_date from (select rownum rn, a.* from (select b_idx, writer, title, hit, reg_date from bbs_t order by b_idx desc) a where rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount}) where rn > (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount}
mapper.insert: insert into bbs_t values( BBS_SEQ.nextval, #{writer}, #{title}, #{content}, #{pw}, 0, #{ip}, #{filename}, sysdate )
mapper.update: update bbs_t set title=#{title}, filename=#{filename}, content=#{content} where b_idx=#{b_idx}
update bbs_t set hit = #{hit} where b_idx=#{b_idx}
